resources.string: Today will be a very cold%d day. You should wear a winter coat and long pants.
Today will be a cold%d day. You should wear a sweater, jacket and long pants.
Today will be a regular%d day. You should wear a long sleeved shirt, jacket and long pants.
Today will be a warm%d day. You should wear a short-sleeved shirt and long pants.
Today will be a very warm%d day. You should wear a short-sleeved shirt and short pants.
